lessons.japanese: 君は、いつも私の服をけなすのだから。
lessons.english: You are always digging at me about my clothes.

lessons.japanese: 彼女自分をけなすことではなかなかのものですよ。
lessons.english: She has a nice line in self-deprecation.

lessons.japanese: 彼の立ち直ろうとする努力をけなすのはよくないことです。
lessons.english: It is wrong to put down his efforts to get better.
